title: An extended Knowledge Compilation Map for Conditional Preference Statements-based and Generalized Additive Utilities-based Languages. (arXiv:2102.04107v2 [cs.AI] UPDATED)
abstract: Conditional preference statements have been used to compactly represent preferences over combinatorial domains. They are at the core of CP-nets and their generalizations, and lexicographic preference trees. Several works have addressed the complexity of some queries (optimization, dominance in particular). We extend in this paper some of these results, and study other queries which have not been addressed so far, like equivalence, and transformations, like conditioning and variable elimination, thereby contributing to a knowledge compilation map for languages based on conditional preference statements. We also study the expressiveness and complexity of queries and transformations for generalized additive utilities.

translated_title: 基于条件偏好语句和广义可加性效用语言的扩展知识编译图
translated_abstract: 条件偏好语句被用来紧凑地表示组合领域中的偏好。它们是CP-网和其一般化版本以及字典排序偏好树的核心。一些研究已经解决了一些查询（特别是优化和支配性）的复杂性。我们在本文中扩展了其中一部分结果，并研究了迄今尚未解决的其他查询，如等价性，以及如条件和变量消除等转换，从而为基于条件偏好语句的语言提供了一个知识编译图。我们还研究了广义可加性效用的查询和转换的表达能力和复杂性。
tldr: 本文扩展了基于条件偏好语句的语言的知识编译图，研究了查询和转换的各种复杂性，并增加了新的查询和转换的研究，对于广义可加性效用也进行了研究。
en_tdlr: This paper extends the knowledge compilation map for languages based on conditional preference statements, studying various complexities of queries and transformations, and adds new research on queries and transformations, including generalized additive utilities.
